CustomField.description: Calculates the Cash Value of the Bundles with Taxes, so this can be referenced in other fields or a Conga doc
CustomField.formula: IF( TEXT(Account.BillingCountryCode) = 'CA', IF( Taxes_Additive__c, Cash_Value_of_Settlement_Bundles__c * (1 + Tax_Rate__c + Secondary_Tax_Rate__c), (Cash_Value_of_Settlement_Bundles__c * (1 + Tax_Rate__c)) * (1 + Secondary_Tax_Rate__c) ), Cash_Value_of_Settlement_Bundles__c )
CustomField.label: Cash Value of Settlement Bundles w/ Tax
